simpledb

Class AbstractDbFileIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.AbstractDbFileIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DbFileIterator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BPlusTreeFileIterator, BPlusTreeSearchIterator

    public abstract class AbstractDbFileIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements DbFileIterator
    Helper for implementing DbFileIterators. Handles hasNext()/next() logic.
